channel.title: Quantum - 639 - Content Addictions
channel.description:
[center][img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg710/scaled.php?server=710&filename=quantumv.png&res=landing[/img]
I want a team because I thought the development was slow and I would always delete something I had spent a while one just because it wouldn't work and I would doubt my abilities. Along with being bored. I don't have money for a website/vps and I wouldn't be able to run it on my computer to save my life (literally) 448MB, so maybe one of the developers could run the server on the computer until (if) we choose to accept donations.
[code=Development Log]Development Log: July 23, 2012 - Added Guthix Wizards Combat files July 24, 2012 - Fixed TurnTo action for magic July 24, 2012 - Fixed Hand cannon special July 24, 2012 - Added Cure Me spell for lunars July 24, 2012 - Added wilderness looting system July 25, 2012 - Added Boss kills and Quest points July 25, 2012 - Added cow milking July 25, 2012 - Added Sheep shearing July 25, 2012 - Added Wheat and Flax picking July 26, 2012 - Tome of frost now replaces water runes July 26, 2012 - Fixed the castle wars teleport out glitch and when you win a game, your rewarded tickets July 26, 2012 - Added More mining spots July 26, 2012 - Added TzTok-Jad with correct delays and healers July 26, 2012 - Added 2 Worlds July 27, 2012 - Stopped working on the source for the day July 28, 2012 - Added Spinning for the crafting skill July 28, 2012 - Nests and gems can now be obtained randomly from mining/wc July 28, 2012 - Fixed door manager July 28, 2012 - Lachtoper now offers jobs July 29, 2012 - Added Barrows Brother combat actions July 30, 2012 - Added Sergeant Sambur at barb course for agile armor July 30, 2012 - Removed most of the npcs from Lumbridge (To start again) July 30, 2012 - Fixed currency issue with the shop currency config July 30, 2012 - Fixed Mandrith and Nastroth July 30, 2012 - Fixed spinning dupe I created July 30, 2012 - Worked on Corporeal beast and NecroLord July 30, 2012 - Worked on Farming, and now there is a class almost complete for it July 30, 2012 - Added Dungeoneering floor generator, but I don't know any of the regions :/ July 31, 2012 - Added some materials for cooking July 31, 2012 - Highered the exp rate July 31, 2012 - Added Cook's Assistant Quest July 31, 2012 - Added Dungeon Tokens (Dungeoneering Tokens) July 31, 2012 - Added saving for warrior guild tokens and fixed doors July 31, 2012 - Added barrows chest reward and fixed the doors July 31, 2012 - Guthan and Dharok now use vengeance (Just to make them harder) August 1, 2012 - Added Warrior guild token decreasing and added cyclops [/code]
The media is here http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,554405.0.html[/center]
[b]What I'm aiming for[/b]
[ul][li]Gotta stick with the title[/li] [li]Quests[/li] [li]Mini-games[/li] [li]Customized content, not immature nor short.[/li][/ul]
[b]Current Developers[/b]
[ul][li]Wildskiller - Server Developer[/li] [li]Empty - Server Developer[/li] [li]Empty - Web Developer[/li][/ul]
[b]My weaknesses are:[/b]
[ul][li]Pulling 1 item out of an array inside a for loop[/li] [li]I can forget a lot of java common sense, so I could end up forgetting something, a lot.[/li][/ul]
[b]What I want the players to have[/b]
[ul][li]Frustration, but they must enjoy it after they've completed/beaten whatever[/li] [li]Jizz in their pants when they've killed someone for loot[/li] [li]Exploration of the game world[/li][/ul]
[b]What I'm looking for in the Developers[/b]
[ul][li]Maturity[/li] [li]Different reasons on why the player would enjoy that feature[/li] [li]Someone close to what I can do in the Java language.[/li][/ul]
[b]What I don't want[/b]
[ul][li]An overflow of money and overpowered players[/li] [li]Drop Parties from administrators[/li][/ul]
[b]Application[/b] [code=Application] Java experience: Age: Position: Time you can be on to program: MSN: Can you prove what you can do with java?
You don't have to do this: What do you think is something fun to do on a rsps?[/code]

item.title: Quantum - 639 - Content Addictions
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

[center]

I want a team because I thought the development was slow and I would always delete something I had spent a while one just because it wouldn’t work and I would doubt my abilities. Along with being bored. I don’t have money for a website/vps and I wouldn’t be able to run it on my computer to save my life (literally) 448MB, so maybe one of the developers could run the server on the computer until (if) we choose to accept donations.

Development Log: July 23, 2012 - Added Guthix Wizards Combat files July 24, 2012 - Fixed TurnTo action for magic July 24, 2012 - Fixed Hand cannon special July 24, 2012 - Added Cure Me spell for lunars July 24, 2012 - Added wilderness looting system July 25, 2012 - Added Boss kills and Quest points July 25, 2012 - Added cow milking July 25, 2012 - Added Sheep shearing July 25, 2012 - Added Wheat and Flax picking July 26, 2012 - Tome of frost now replaces water runes July 26, 2012 - Fixed the castle wars teleport out glitch and when you win a game, your rewarded tickets July 26, 2012 - Added More mining spots July 26, 2012 - Added TzTok-Jad with correct delays and healers July 26, 2012 - Added 2 Worlds July 27, 2012 - Stopped working on the source for the day July 28, 2012 - Added Spinning for the crafting skill July 28, 2012 - Nests and gems can now be obtained randomly from mining/wc July 28, 2012 - Fixed door manager July 28, 2012 - Lachtoper now offers jobs July 29, 2012 - Added Barrows Brother combat actions July 30, 2012 - Added Sergeant Sambur at barb course for agile armor July 30, 2012 - Removed most of the npcs from Lumbridge (To start again) July 30, 2012 - Fixed currency issue with the shop currency config July 30, 2012 - Fixed Mandrith and Nastroth July 30, 2012 - Fixed spinning dupe I created July 30, 2012 - Worked on Corporeal beast and NecroLord July 30, 2012 - Worked on Farming, and now there is a class almost complete for it July 30, 2012 - Added Dungeoneering floor generator, but I don't know any of the regions :/ July 31, 2012 - Added some materials for cooking July 31, 2012 - Highered the exp rate July 31, 2012 - Added Cook's Assistant Quest July 31, 2012 - Added Dungeon Tokens (Dungeoneering Tokens) July 31, 2012 - Added saving for warrior guild tokens and fixed doors July 31, 2012 - Added barrows chest reward and fixed the doors July 31, 2012 - Guthan and Dharok now use vengeance (Just to make them harder) August 1, 2012 - Added Warrior guild token decreasing and added cyclops

The media is here http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,554405.0.html[/center]

What I’m aiming for

[ul][li]Gotta stick with the title[/li]
[li]Quests[/li]
[li]Mini-games[/li]
[li]Customized content, not immature nor short.[/li][/ul]

Current Developers

[ul][li]Wildskiller - Server Developer[/li]
[li]Empty - Server Developer[/li]
[li]Empty - Web Developer[/li][/ul]

My weaknesses are:

[ul][li]Pulling 1 item out of an array inside a for loop[/li]
[li]I can forget a lot of java common sense, so I could end up forgetting something, a lot.[/li][/ul]

What I want the players to have

[ul][li]Frustration, but they must enjoy it after they’ve completed/beaten whatever[/li]
[li]Jizz in their pants when they’ve killed someone for loot[/li]
[li]Exploration of the game world[/li][/ul]

What I’m looking for in the Developers

[ul][li]Maturity[/li]
[li]Different reasons on why the player would enjoy that feature[/li]
[li]Someone close to what I can do in the Java language.[/li][/ul]

What I don’t want

[ul][li]An overflow of money and overpowered players[/li]
[li]Drop Parties from administrators[/li][/ul]

Application

[code=Application]
Java experience:
Age:
Position:
Time you can be on to program:
MSN:
Can you prove what you can do with java?

You don’t have to do this:
What do you think is something fun to do on a rsps?[/code]

Read full topic
